extendedInfo.description: Have you ever imagined yourself as a face on a dollar bill? You now have the chance to look like a boss!  Dollar Bill - it's Your Dollar! With this money game, just take a photo of your friends, pets, teddy bears, celebrities from newspapers or a portrait of anybody and be ready to create an absolutely unique one dollar bill within a few seconds! This little money planner application makes any image look like a photo on a paper money with some filters changing the money background.Share it on facebook or save it on your SD card instantly! With Facebook application on your phone it is much easier to share!Create a dollar and have fun with this money game while you make amazing money themes!Droid your money and imagine great money ideas and soon you will be the money king or the real money maker so dont miss the chance! And dont forget: you can create it with any kind of money pictures, but dont be sad if a money scanner fails it or a money slot says: fake money  :) And if you have a money tracker do not forget to add it as: maximum money value! Because its yours!

reviews.title: Not that good
reviews.comment: You can only use live pictures not pictures from your gallery... I don\'t like it!
reviews.author: Griselda LaTorre

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I used this to be my neice pic on money to play a birthday game
reviews.author: Ramona Hayes

reviews.title: Lame broken app !!
reviews.comment: You cannot use existing pics!  You cannot share pics either ! Uninstalled !
reviews.author: Nassar Khan

reviews.title: Well Tried :(
reviews.comment: I liked the app but not that much. If it would have that option of choosing from gallery... If it would be there I would rate this app a 5 star but nevernontheless Good work guys
reviews.author: Alireza Akber

reviews.title: I dollar
reviews.comment: The I dollar app is way better it changes. The photo to the actual money color and you can choose what bill. You want to be on. I this app is a shame
reviews.author: Marcella Rainey

reviews.title: Actually made me laugh
reviews.comment: They should make more US currency and mayb even from other countries ...and you should be able to zoom in too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool idea, but very limited
reviews.comment: The app has pretty good graphics and doesn\'t look cheaply executed, and it\'s a nice idea overall. However you can\'t do much else. There\'s only a $1 bill option, you can\'t pick from your gallery (only pic taken at the moment), and no front-facing camera option (which makes it hard to fit your face in the small hole without a mirror in front of you). It also gets boring fast, uninstalled in less than 5 min.
reviews.author: Annie D
